sentence: Steak house restaurant by the ocean serves lunch buffet which is nice
Beach venders were always polite and did not bug ya
In fact between all the great hotel activities morning water aerobics salsa dancing on the beach evening live music and theater and the awesome beach I was never ever bored
The beach was gorgious the food was delicouis
The beach water was clean too with the exception of some areas where seaweed had taken over but overall was pretty clear and blue
The lobby grounds pool and beach all look like something out of a magazine
We had an amazing ocean view 2 stories of balconies that had a view of a old ship wreck out on the reef and more room than we knew what to do with
Beautiful beach powdery sand
The best beach anyone could ask for
What you read about too many trees is totally true on the beach
The beach was beautiful but lots of seaweed
The beach is pretty clean and once in warmAlthough a bit to much sand as far as you can go in with out swimming
If you want to celebrate a wedding there was a beautiful gazebo for that right on the beach
Beach was excellent except for the rough waves
We managed 2 trips to the water park one beach party at the hotel next door one foam pool party one trip to the nightclub 2 trips to the gym
But for the most part it is filled with sea grass
Out of our 5 day stay it was on the last day as we were leaving did we see clean sand clean ocean with turquoise water and that only lasted from morning till noon time
We recognize this is an ocean and seaweed is to be expected
The beach was beauitful there was some seaweed but nothing that was overwhelming
The beach is n’t crowded like others down the water the night life is lively but does n’t keep you up if you want to sleep
Pool beach towels changed daily
We decided not to even try this as we had similar service in Montego Bay last year and spent several hours waiting to get a table
We stayed at similar hotel in Cancun Mexico Riu Peninsula and food service and housekeeping was way better but the beach and weather is better at DR
If you want a place to come eat food and lay on the beach this is the place to go in the DRPS
Many of the sunbeds on the beach were broken or sagging but once you found decent beds it was bliss that is until you backside goes numb due to the lack of a cushion
We never left the resort as there was everything we needed day or night right there many food options beach pool shopping even a water park
Because this hotel is on the Riu complex with at least four other Riu hotels probably more you can walk along the beach and pop in to the other hotels and grab a drink or a bit of lunch
They said I did not Pay for a ocean view even though they saw it on the picture
They had a pool party location which kept the people who wanted to get drunk and be loud away from the pools close to the beach
